        }
        
        .journal {
            font-size: 14px;
            color: #333;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
            display: block;
        }

        /* Paper/Preprint link */
        .link {
            font-size: 13px;
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 6px 14px;
            background: #007bff;
            color: white;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 6px;
            margin-right: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .link:hover {
            background: #0056b3;
            transform: translateY(-1px);
            box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(0,123,255,0.3);
            color: white;
        }

        .link::before {
            content: "\f15c";
            font-family: "Font Awesome 6 Free";
            font-weight: 900;
            margin-right: 6px;
        }

        /* Code link */
        .code-link {
            font-size: 13px;
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 6px 14px;
            background: white;
            color: #6c757d;
            text-decoration: none;
            border: 1.5px solid #6c757d;
            border-radius: 6px;
            margin-right: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .code-link:hover {
            background: #6c757d;
            color: white;
            transform: translateY(-1px);
            box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(108,117,125,0.3);
        }

        .code-link::before {
            content: "\f121";
            font-family: "Font Awesome 6 Free";
            font-weight: 900;
            margin-right: 6px;
        }

        /* Preregistration link */
        .preregistration-link {
            font-size: 13px;

            padding: 6px 14px;
            background: white;
            color: #28a745;
            text-decoration: none;

            border-radius: 6px;
            margin-right: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .preregistration-link:hover {
            background: #28a745;
            color: white;
            transform: translateY(-1px);
            box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(40,167,69,0.3);
        }

        .preregistration-link::before {
            content: "\f15b";
            font-family: "Font Awesome 6 Free";
            font-weight: 900;
            margin-right: 6px;

        }
